column5: ~~~Heading up to Pigeon Lake tonight with a group, and wondering what season is open, tried reading the Reg.s and became confused. is Walleye, and Crappie still open
Everything is still open. Not atlantics!
Good luck.  Fishing has been tough
Not atlantics!  I hope the Atlantic population in Pigeon survives!
~~~plan to toss a worm out on a hook sit back and have a nap, in a quiet bay, out of the wind. Cant get out of the trip, rather phish the BOQ, over ruled.
I hope the Atlantic population in Pigeon survives! As do I

Panfish open all year, walleye open until November 15 and muskie and bass until December 15th. However, I don't know if there are any in the lake judging by the last few times I have been out. Like the captain said, it's been very tough.
I hope the Atlantic population in Pigeon survives! No chance, they are great eating!
